entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as shaking all over and helping Dumbledore into the boat. He is also referred to by name in the conversation with Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as struggling to climb into the boat and needing Harry's help. His faint voice is also mentioned.

entities.name: inferi
entities.description: The Inferi are described as swarming below the boat and being deterred by the ring of fire.

relationships.description: Harry helps Dumbledore into the boat.
Harry is frightened by the Inferi, which are described as coming at him.
Dumbledore is helped into the boat by Harry.
The ring of fire repels the Inferi, preventing them from resurfacing.
